quizDescription: Test your knowledge about Rihanna and her remarkable career in music, acting, and entrepreneurship!

questions.question: What is Rihanna's full name?
questions.explanation: Rihanna's full name is Robyn Rihanna Fenty.

questions.question: Which Caribbean island is Rihanna originally from?
questions.explanation: Rihanna is originally from the Caribbean island of Barbados.

questions.question: What was Rihanna's debut single that propelled her to fame?
questions.explanation: Rihanna's debut single that brought her to fame is 'Pon de Replay.'

questions.question: Which one of Rihanna's albums earned her the first Grammy Award of her career?
questions.explanation: Rihanna won her first Grammy Award with the album 'Good Girl Gone Bad.'

questions.question: Rihanna made her acting debut in which 2012 action film?
options: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
questions.explanation: Rihanna made her acting debut in the 2012 action film 'Battleship.'

questions.question: Which one of Rihanna's hit songs features the famous line 'Shine bright like a diamond'?
questions.explanation: The hit song with the famous line 'Shine bright like a diamond' is 'Diamonds.'

questions.question: In 2014, Rihanna was honored with the CFDA Fashion Icon Award for her influential style. What does CFDA stand for?
options: Council of Fashion Designers of America
Center for Fashion and Design Artistry
questions.answer: Council of Fashion Designers of America
questions.explanation: Rihanna received the CFDA Fashion Icon Award, and CFDA stands for 'Council of Fashion Designers of America.'

questions.question: What is the title of Rihanna's first studio album released in 2005?
questions.explanation: Rihanna's first studio album, released in 2005, is titled 'Music of the Sun.'

questions.question: Rihanna founded her own makeup brand in 2017. What is the name of this successful cosmetics line?
questions.explanation: Rihanna's successful makeup brand, launched in 2017, is named 'Fenty Beauty.'

questions.question: Which one of Rihanna's albums won the Grammy Award for Best Urban Contemporary Album?
questions.explanation: Rihanna's album 'Anti' won the Grammy Award for Best Urban Contemporary Album.

questions.question: Rihanna collaborated with which famous rapper on the hit song 'Love the Way You Lie'?
questions.explanation: Rihanna collaborated with Eminem on the hit song 'Love the Way You Lie.'

questions.question: What is the title of Rihanna's 2019 album that features the chart-topping single 'Work'?
questions.explanation: Rihanna's 2019 album that features the chart-topping single 'Work' is titled 'Anti.'

questions.question: Rihanna starred in the sci-fi film 'Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets.' Who was her co-star in the film?
questions.explanation: Rihanna's co-star in the sci-fi film 'Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets' was Dane DeHaan.

questions.question: What is the name of Rihanna's philanthropic foundation that focuses on global issues like education and healthcare?
questions.explanation: Rihanna's philanthropic foundation that focuses on global issues like education and healthcare is named 'Clara Lionel Foundation.'

questions.question: Rihanna earned her first Grammy Award for Best Rap/Sung Collaboration on the song 'Umbrella.' Who was her collaborator on the track?
questions.explanation: Rihanna's collaborator on the track 'Umbrella,' for which she won her first Grammy Award, was Jay-Z.
